title: Google\Cloud\BigQuery\Storage\V1\ReadSession\TableReadOptions
name: TableReadOptions
description:
Options dictating how we read a table.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.bigquery.storage.v1.ReadSession.TableReadOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.selected_fields
params.description: Names of the fields in the table that should be read. If empty, all fields will be read. If the specified field is a nested field, all the sub-fields in the field will be selected. The output field order is unrelated to the order of fields in selected_fields.

params.name: data.row_restriction
params.description: SQL text filtering statement, similar to a WHERE clause in a query. Aggregates are not supported. Examples: "int_field > 5" "date_field = CAST('2014-9-27' as DATE)" "nullable_field is not NULL" "st_equals(geo_field, st_geofromtext("POINT(2, 2)"))" "numeric_field BETWEEN 1.0 AND 5.0" Restricted to a maximum length for 1 MB.

params.name: data.arrow_serialization_options
params.description: Optional. Options specific to the Apache Arrow output format.
